name: encrypted-messaging
description: I've become quite intrigued lately with the prospect of on-chain encrypted messaging leveraging any Ethereum wallet's public/private key for encryption and decryption. Encrypting data with a given user's public key is a relatively easy operation. But in order to decrypt this data seamlessly in a dapp, the Ethereum wallet must play a role. The only alternative way to decrypt is instructing the user to export their private key and run an algorithm, which is a terrible user experience for the mainstream user.
